attributes.action: Support our Prime Minister, and stand behind him. Let him get the job done!
attributes.background: Parliament has not worked together or accepted previous Proposals and we are all divided. So let’s put our trust in Boris and support our Prime Minister and let’s leave the EU and regain pride in our great Country.

rejection.details:
We understand you're concerned about leaving the EU but we're not sure exactly what you want the Government or Parliament to do.

There are already petitions about leaving the EU which you might like to sign if they call for things you want to happen. You're more likely to get action on this issue if you sign and share a single petition, for example:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/257347
